member.name: T:UTorrentAPI.TorrentRemovalOptions
member.summary: Used to specify what should be removed when removing a torrent

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentRemovalOptions.Job
member.summary: Removes the selected torrent job(s) from the list, but all related files are left intact on the disk

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentRemovalOptions.TorrentFile
member.summary: Removes the selected torrent job(s) from the list and the corresponding .torrent file(s) from the .torrent file storage location.

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentRemovalOptions.Data
member.summary: Removes the selected torrent job(s) from the list and all content downloaded from the torrent job(s).

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentRemovalOptions.TorrentFileAndData
member.summary: Removes the selected torrent job(s) from the list, the corresponding .torrent file(s) from the .torrent file storage location, and all content downloaded from the torrent job(s).

member.name: T:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.EmptyResponse
member.summary: Basically a "void" return value from the uTorrent API. It includes a build number and nothing else.

member.name: P:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.EmptyResponse.BuildNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the build number returned by uTorrent

member.name: T:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy
member.summary: The WCF Client interface for communicating with the uTorrent web API

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy.ListTorrents(System.String)
member.summary: Calls the list action on the uTorrent web API. This call includes the cache id parameter so that only incremental changes are returned from uTorrent.
member.param: The cacheid to use for the request. "0" means no caching.

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy.AddTorrentFromUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified torrent and starts it immediately
member.param: A url to the torrent to start

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy.AddTorrentFromUrl(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified torrent and starts it immediately
member.param: A url to the torrent to start
The index of the download directory from calling ListDirectories
The sub path to use under the directory provided in downloadDir

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy.AddTorrentFromFile(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Adds the specified torrent file and starts it immediately
member.param: A stream of the torrent file. The stream must be preencoded as formdata/multipart.

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.Protocol.IUTorrentProxy.AddTorrentFromFile(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified torrent file and starts it immediately
member.param: A stream of the torrent file. The stream must be preencoded as formdata/multipart.
The index of the download directory from calling ListDirectories
The sub path to use under the directory provided in downloadDir

member.summary: Paused means the torrent job is paused, but not stopped (still connected to peers).

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentStatus.Queued

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.TorrentStatus.Loaded
member.summary: DOCUMENTATION NEEDED

summary.para: FinishedOrStopped means the torrent job is not uploading. If progress = 1000, then the torrent is Finished and has been stopped after it reached seeding mode. If Progress < 1000, then the torrent was stopped.
If the torrent job reaches Finished without user intervention, then it means it reached the seeding goal.

member.name: T:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient
member.summary: This is the main entrypoint to the UTorrentAPI and provides access to the torrent job list, program settings, etc.
member.remarks: All of the objects created by this API have some shared resources (for example, the underlying channel used to connect to uTorrent). I have done my best to allow for threadsafe access across objects in the API, but threadsafety is not guaranteed.

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.proxy
member.summary: A WCF channel used to communicate with uTorrent.

member.name: F:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.channelFactory
member.summary: A WCF channel factory used to construct the channel.

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.#ctor(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UTorrentClient class.
member.param: The uri of the uTorrent web api
The username to use to log into uTorrent
The password to use
The size of message to accept from uTorrent web

member.name: M:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.Dispose
member.summary: Cleans up this instance and closes the underlying channel and channel factory.

member.name: P:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.Torrents
member.summary: Gets the current collection of torrent jobs.

member.name: P:UTorrentAPI.UTorrentClient.StorageDirectories
member.summary: Gets the directories that can be used for storing torrent data.
